title: North Texas house fire possibly sparked by Tesla charger, officials say

title: An electric vehicle sparked a house fire in Lewisville, according to officials. No injuries were rep
content: An electric vehicle sparked a house fire in Lewisville, according to officials. No injuries were reported.

title: Lewisville. Structure Fire. 300 Meadowview Way.  Alarm Reporting a Tesla on Fire in the garage. Truc
content: Lewisville. Structure Fire. 300 Meadowview Way.  Alarm Reporting a Tesla on Fire in the garage. Truck 6 out with Fully involved Garage. Requesting next company go interior.
